text:
Circle River | New York City | ONSITE | Full Time

Circle River is an early stage startup developing Artificial Intelligence based personal assistants.

  * System design / system architecture
  * Full-stack JavaScript engineer
  * Angular front-end
  * NodeJS backend
  * Mongoose ODM
  * WebSockets and real-time communications
  * REST API design
Nice to have:

  * Docker and container orchestration
  * AWS or similar
  * Firebase
We are looking for an experienced engineer looking for a challenging role creating a new consumer-based product. The candidate must have direct experience taking a lead role in multiple major projects using the architectural elements and languages listed above.

Compensation includes salary and equity.

Apply: amb@circleriver.com
